mapper.insert:

mapper.select: SELECT D.DEP_CD, D.COL_CD, D.PRO_NO, (SELECT SE.EMP_NM FROM EMPLOYEE SE WHERE D.PRO_NO = SE.EMP_NO) PRO_NM, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_DES, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL, D.EMP_NO, (SELECT TE.EMP_NM FROM EMPLOYEE TE WHERE TE.EMP_NO = D.EMP_NO) EMP_NM FROM DEPARTMENT D WHERE D.DEP_CD = #{depCd}
